title: My Club is still missing :(
body: I never write on the board but I need help in getting my group back... but it doesn't even show up at all like nothing is there and when i try to create it again it just doesn't let me. {{champion:36}} Please help, but i forgot to mention is that everyone is still in it.

replies.body:
This is an issue that popped up after the club re-enable that we're aware of and are working on a fix. I can't provide an ETA on when that fix will roll out, but you can keep up with updates on this issue [here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Mine is missing too, when trying to recreate it; says the name is unavailable.
